lead_paragraph: The World Anti-Doping Agency has detailed serious failings of doping control management at the Rio de Janeiro Olympics, saying the system was only saved from collapsing by the "enormous resourcefulness and goodwill" of some key staff.

headline.print_headline: WADA Cites Near Collapse of Anti-Doping Program at Rio Games
headline.main: WADA Cites Near Collapse of Anti-Doping Program at Rio Games

snippet: The World Anti-Doping Agency has detailed serious failings of doping control management at the Rio de Janeiro Olympics, saying the system was only saved from collapsing by the "enormous resourcefulness and goodwill" of some key staff....
